DOC.brief_summary: [ Purpose ] To investigate prevalence musculoskeletal disorder among healthy student Ahlia University determine relationship prevalence musculoskeletal disorder academic stressor body mass index . [ Subjects Methods ] : Self-administered questionnaire distribute 94 student age 18-26 year enrol various Ahlia University colleges meet inclusion criterion . The student respond standardized Nordic musculoskeletal questionnaire modify College Student Stress Inventory regard musculoskeletal symptom academic stressor . Height weight measurement also obtain determine body mass index . Keywords : Body mass index , Academic stress , Musculoskeletal disorder
DOC.brief_title: Body Mass Index , Academic Stress Musculoskeletal Disorders Relationships
DOC.detailed_description: [ Purpose ] To investigate prevalence musculoskeletal disorder among healthy student Ahlia University determine relationship prevalence musculoskeletal disorder academic stressor body mass index . [ Subjects Methods ] : Self-administered questionnaire distribute 94 student age 18-26 year enrol various Ahlia University colleges meet inclusion criterion . The student respond standardized Nordic musculoskeletal questionnaire modify College Student Stress Inventory regard musculoskeletal symptom academic stressor . Height weight measurement also obtain determine body mass index . Keywords : Body mass index , Academic stress , Musculoskeletal disorder
DOC.criteria: A total 28 male 66 female student ( age , 1826 year ; mean , 21 Â± 1.9 year ) various Ahlia University college recruit participate study . To include study , subject enrol undergraduate program Ahlia University , Bahrain . In addition , relatively healthy diagnose medical condition would cause pain . Exclusion criterion previous injury trauma body part , surgical intervention , history psychological disorder prior enrolment university , severe physical disability cause pain . In addition , student blood disorder , sickle cell anaemia thalassaemia , exclude .
